title: Nutriota Selencora (Selenium w/ Zinc and Copper) | (180 Capsules)
aboutContent: NUTRIOTA SELENCORA - A powerful 3-in-1 mineral formula, available in bottles of 180 high concentration capsules. Each serving provides 100mcg selenium, 7.5mg zinc and 0.25mg of copper. Our supplement is suitable for men and women, as well as vegans and vegetarians. This powerful blend is formulated for overall well-being, contributing to normal immune system and thyroid functions.
descriptionContent: Selenium, zinc and copper are essential minerals that play important roles in the body, contributing to the smooth functioning of the immune system and overall health. In addition to supporting normal thyroid function, Selencora helps to keep your skin, hair and nails healthy. If you find it difficult to meet your mineral needs through nutrition alone, this supplement can help ensure you get your nutritional intake.
ingredientsContent: bulking agent (microcrystalline cellulose), capsule coating [coating agent (hydroxypropyl methylcellulose)], sodium selenite (selenium), zinc, anti-caking agents (magnesium salts of fatty acids, silicon dioxide), copper.
generalInfoContent:
Package Dimensions: 10.9 x 5.3 x 5.3 cm; 90 g
Units: 180 Count
Brand: Nutriota
Format: Capsule
Manufacturer: Nutriota
ASIN: B0CT64JJ1N
